domain.description: Politicians in the world, like Joe Biden

text: @Mike_Pence Yes, the unborn. Once they’re born you’re okay with them getting shot in their classrooms, not having healthcare, not having enough to eat, and dying from COVID19. You aren’t interested in protecting anyone. All you crave is control over women’s bodies. Sick!
